Complete collection of classes and subclasses for D&D 5e 2024 A customizable triptych containing all classes and their subclasses from D&D 5e 2024. Each card details the abilities, progressions, and specializations of each class. Contents: All classes from D&D 5e 2024 All available subclasses Detailed cards with level progression 5e 2024 Compatible Customization options: Selection of specific classes Choice of preferred subclasses Triptych format organized by theme Individual cards available Master your class and explore all possible paths!
